forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind 18 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West wind 18 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
As sunlight spills brightly over Downtown San Francisco, the city basks in a rare moment of clarity. With a high temperature gently settling around 63, the atmosphere feels vibrant yet refreshingly cool, a delightful juxtaposition that invites exploration. Strong westerly winds gusting to 31 mph whisk away any remnants of fog, leaving behind a panoramic view from Sutro Tower that sparkles with potential. The horizon is awash with the sharp outlines of buildings, each glistening under the clear dome of sky, a striking contrast against the deep blues of the bay.

As night approaches, the skyline will transition gracefully towards twilight, with temperatures dipping to around 50. Those venturing out this evening should consider layers—a light jacket to fend off the cool breeze, perhaps paired with a cozy scarf, making a stroll or even a casual gathering in one of the many local cafes a perfect pursuit. An evening walk along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment in a neighborhood park can turn this fine day into a sweet memory. Amidst the rustling leaves and the whisper of the ocean, San Francisco unfurls its charm, inviting you to step outside and embrace it.
